publ: by What's My Age Again Software
name: AgeReminder
0:
”Alexa, ask age reminder for my age.”
”Alexa, ask age reminder, what's my age again?”
”Alexa, tell age reminder to give me my age.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: age reminder
des:
Alexa will tell you your age. Add your birthday to your Facebook profile (including year), and then link this skill to your Facebook account. Be sure to grant this skill permission to access your birthday when linking it to your Facebook account.

Icons made by Madebyoliver from www.flaticon.com
https://www.flaticon.com/authors/madebyoliver
